title: Not sure who to get zed vs katarina vs talon
body: Ok, I am lvl 29 and I have saved up 6300 ip from the oceanweek event. I am looking to get either zed or katarina or talon because I love playing assassin, I am decently skilled at all 3, I've tried em all out. Should I get zed because I will dedicate time to master him and is he good at silver level ranked games. Or should I get katarina but does she get banned in bronze - gold games alot? Or talon

replies.body:
kat gets banned in all levels, she's one of the stronger champions ingame, you're better off getting zed.


If mastered though, Kat is by far the most rewarding of the 3.
Zyra because the best CC is death.

Kat is really strong right now, but requires some skill to actually combo properly now.

Zed still seems strong to me, but he's dipped in must ban/play.

Talon is eh.  He can be really strong but he pretty much just kills 1 target IMO.  Zed and Kat do a lot of AOE where as Talon can pretty much only kill one from what I've seen.  Maybe I'm wrong, I don't play him often, but I feel like the other two are better.
You don't want Zed yet, since he's too mechanically demanding. It would hurt you a lot more than help to do mediocre on Zed, than vs doing mediocre on Talon or Kat.

I'd suggest {{champion:91}} if your not worried about your champion getting banned and he's fun. If skill is important to you {{champion:238}} has a very high skill cap to master and is fun. If being banned and pms is important to you then {{champion:55}}

Kat is my favorite

Talon is good, I don't like his playstyle of feast or famine

Zed is dogshit dont buy him
